longDescription: If diet and workouts can’t shift your double chin, Aqualyx offers a precise, non-surgical solution. The deoxycholic acid-based formula breaks down fat cells under the chin, which are naturally eliminated over weeks. We combine injections with lymphatic massage, jawline contouring, and lifestyle tips so your profile stays sharp.

relatedTreatments.description: Add filler for sharper contour after fat reduction.
relatedTreatments.title: Jawline Sculpt

faq.question: Is swelling normal?
faq.answer: Yes—expect chipmunk swelling for 3-5 days as fat cells break down.
Fat cells are destroyed for good, but weight gain can create new ones. Maintain a stable lifestyle for best results.
faq.question: Are results permanent?

hero.headline: Wave Goodbye to Submental Fullness
hero.subheadline: Doctor-only Aqualyx injections sculpt a tighter jawline in 2-3 sessions.

overview.content: Aqualyx contains deoxycholic acid, a bile acid that breaks down fat cell membranes. Once destroyed, fat is naturally eliminated through the lymphatic system. We map your under-chin, inject micro-doses, then guide you through massage, diet tweaks, and jawline exercises to enhance results.
highlights: Pairs with jawline filler or Nefertiti lift
overview.title: How Fat Dissolving Works
